docs.snippet: Incumbent U.S. Sen. Brian Schatz won a tense Democratic primary election in Hawaii, proving that he is no longer just a senator who was appointed to his seat — he has captured the confidence of Hawaii voters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Incumbent U.S. Sen. Brian Schatz won a tense Democratic primary election in Hawaii, proving that he is no longer just a senator who was appointed to his seat — he has captured the confidence of Hawaii voters.

headline.main: Schatz Wins Over Voters in Tough US Senate Primary
headline.print_headline: Schatz Wins Over Voters in Tough US Senate Primary

docs.snippet: The California racetrack will host the 2017 Breeders’ Cup, but its summer meet has been troubled by a series of calamities, including the deaths of five horses on the newly installed turf course....
docs.lead_paragraph: The California racetrack will host the 2017 Breeders’ Cup, but its summer meet has been troubled by a series of calamities, including the deaths of five horses on the newly installed turf course.
docs.abstract: Summer meet at California's Del Mar racetrack has been troubled by a series of calamities, including the deaths of twelve horses, suspensions for animal abuse and a trailer fire; track's newly installed turf, on which five horses have died after breaking down, has drawn particular scrutiny.

headline.main: Scrutiny Circles Track at Del Mar
headline.print_headline: Scrutiny Circles Track at Del Mar
